website_summaries.verdict: If you're comfortable applying eyeliner with a brush, there's no better waterproof option.
pros: Available in black, charcoal, brown, and eggplant
Gel liner produces dark, crisp lines
One jar lasts about 6 months with daily use
Gel glides on smoothly and remains intact through rain and sweat
Included brush is soft and gentle on eyes
cons: Gel pot and brush application can be tough to master for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Liquids are not easy to apply anymore
customer_reviews.text: I am 71 years old. My eyelids are not strong enough to use a regular pencil. Liquids are not easy to apply anymore. I needed just a touch of a liner to help give a little depth to my eyes. I found this Gel on Amazon. The gel goes on easy and I can control it. It does not irritate. Reviews are so very important when looking for a product!!
customer_reviews.author: Darce J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Why all the high reviews?!?
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this three times, three different days, trying to get this to work. It smudged all over the place, leaving me with huge raccoon eyes every time - and I only wear eyeliner on my top eyelid. I tried it with and without powder eye shadow. I thought maybe I was unknowingly rubbing my eyes, but the third time I applied the eyeliner, I lay down for a quick rest (not to sleep) and still had smudges under my eyes when I got up. This is a fail for me. Too bad I can't return, a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy shops for bargains

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever!! Do get! Its the greatest I've ever used!! If you put on the lightest amount it will stay on the whole day! Its really the best for a natural look or a heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Mika R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! I have monolids so my makeup smudges really easily but I find that I don't even have to use a primer or set this. It just stays on all day without having to reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love / Hate
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review make-up because it's subjective a lot, and I tend to be sensitive to a lot. So, let's start with the good stuff... the color is very pretty. Very brown in the pot, dries darker. Does NOT smudge once dry. Which brings us to the bad... getting this stuff off your eyelid is brutal. Even with a make-up cleanser, I had to scrub pretty hard to get this off my eyelid. Perhaps there's a trick to it, but I think I'll keep looking for a new eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Angel

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner at the moment. I'm not particularly good at applying makeup, but this is really easy for me to apply. The biggest thing I was looking for was something that wouldn't smudge and leave me with raccoon eyes. I have two small kids and don't need my undereyes looking any darker than they already do, haha, and this stuff stays in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. My favorite part is that it's so easy to apply. That being said, on the negatives, it is prone to smudging. If I rub my eyes, it tends to smudge and water definitely smudges it (though not immediately). It certainly won't run down your face like in the movies if you cry a bit, but you will tend to look a bit like a raccoon. Back on the positives, it lasts quite a long time (days even) but it will smudge. Overall, definitely recommend for the longevity, easy application, and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Fellow makeup idiots beware, male raccoons rejoice
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is not for novices. It stays on really well (I do have eyeliners that work better), but it is hard to apply without practice. I ended up looking like a raccoon hooker. It is also gummy and cakes like mascara-- raccoon hooker mascara. You have to dip the brush in the pot and play around with getting just the right amount. Wouldn't buy it again, unless I was seeing someone into raccoons. If you are looking for more idiot proof and more waterproof liner, try Stila. I bought both together and Stila is easily 4.5-5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amalthea

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused about all the good reviews. This doesn’t stay on at all and imprints on my top lid in less than an hour. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Marta Gorecka

customer_reviews.title: I am terrible at putting on liquid liner
customer_reviews.text: I am terrible at putting on liquid liner, but I have had several flawless makeup nights with this product. It is easy to spread, and you can get a line as sharp as liquid liner. I live in a humid environment, and it doesn't sweat and bleed over the course of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite eyeliner!! Really love this stuff. I don't do liquid eyeliner well but his is almost a gel consistency. Somewhere between liquid and pencil. It's wonderful! Really easy to apply - MUCH easier than liquid - and it stays put all day long. I was more impressed with this than I even had hoped to be. Just make sure you don't put too much on your brush at a time - and be sure to clean off your brush when you're done. It will dry out. This pot will last someone a really long time because a little goes a long, long way. It's great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: c7

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gel Liner
customer_reviews.text: Nicely pigmented for the price! Consistency is creamy, which I love. The eyeliner is smudge-proof only after letting it sit for a couple minutes (like any other eyeliner) and will easily come off with makeup remover. The brush that comes with it isn’t something to rave about, but if you’re looking for a thin angled eyeliner brush, checkout EIGSHOW’s Fine Angled Eyeliner brush (shown in my photo). Also, I have sensitive skin (and eczema) and so far I haven’t had issues. I’ll update this review if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting and doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I was definetly disappointed with this eyeliner. I can't complain about it being hard to apply but as far as how long it stays in place, that's my biggest complaint. I had alot of trouble with it either wearing off quickly or smudging down under my eyes leaving me looking like a raccoon or like someone just capped my eyes. I also wear contacts and this really gave me alot of trouble with them. I found there seemed to be residue from the eyeliner that always seemed to get on my contacts and really bother my eyes. Sadly I can't recommend this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGurl

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyeliner since it first hit the shelves. This particular eyeliner has always stayed on an entire workday (and then some) I've never had to reapply. Ever. I saw that it was cheaper than what I normally pay and I definitely had to buy it. I have tried several different brands and nothing compares to this one. It lasts me sometimes 6 months. Believe me, I go through some eyeliner. Its definitely worth it to me. On top of the price being cheaper, my order arrived much earlier than expected. I am extremely satisfied with this product and with the careful and fast shipping. Will definitely order again instead of grabbing at Wal-Mart or Rite aid.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Never buy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smears horribly after a few hours. I could not get a small line but only a think line on my eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: The BEST eyeliner you can use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my GO-TO eyeliner! I've tried all different brands of liquid, pencil, and gel eye liner. This is without a doubt the easiest, longest lasting and best eyeliner I've ever used. The brush really makes it easy to glide the gel on. I wish they sold the brush somewhere separately because after a couple of months the brush starts to not be as fine on the end. Notice I said after a couple of months because this gel pot lasts me for almost a year. And that's with everyday use. And at this price, you can't beat that. I've been using this eyeliner for about 5 years now and really find no need to use anything else. Like ever.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: ) Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This gel liner is INCREDIBLE :) Easy to apply, and long lasting! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This lasts longer and looks better than the revlon it replaces. The charcoal colors is great for day wear and doesn’t leave gunk in the corner of my eyes or end up below my eyes when I’ve only put it in my top lid (the revlon gel liner does). Also works great on the water line and is easy to apply. Not sold on the angled brush so will probably end up using my own brush, but I definitely remember why I prefer maybelline cosmetics in the drugstore brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rainstorm9

customer_reviews.title: Cool Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I saw this eyeliner on a TV commercial and decided to try it out. I was disappointed because the brush arrived bent so it's hard to apply. But once it's on my eyes, I love it. It goes on smooth and you can easily control how thick you want it. At first, I thought it was going to be greasy to the touch... and it kinda is when you put it on but after it sets up, it's there. Waterproof as promised. I'd give it a higher rating if my brush wasn't bent. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I'm in between a 2 and 3... I'm no makeup connosierue by any means but this brush felt really bulky for application. The formula itself goes on pretty silky and I loved that but a little goes a loooooong way. It also smudges fairly easily at first so be careful. This is great for blending in or getting a nice soft line however, I do not recommend if you are in a hot or humid environment as this tends to spread all over as you perspire or simply soak into the eyelid which I found off-putting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay put eyeliner - no more melt downs
customer_reviews.text: My favorite, beloved eye pencil failed me big time while visiting Florida with the heat and humidity. I had ordered this product but hadn't used it until my make up was melting down my face. This product goes on nicely and stays put way, way longer than my usual eye liner. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Haleiwa

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for Blacktrack
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this is a dupe for MAC Blacktrack. The brush it comes with is mediocre, but when I use my own tiny thin brush I usually use with my Blacktrack, there is almost no difference between the two liners. This stuff doesn't go on quite as smooth, but almost. And it stays put through several eye drop applications daily (post-Lasik). For the price, I will be using this for now.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I saw people said to get a different brush, so I ordered a set. I had no problem with the brush that came with it. I start in the middle of my lid, and go to the outer edge of the eye, and then go back to the middle and go to the inner corner. It just worked better for me this way. Once it is on, it doesn't smudge off. I can't talk about waterproofing as I usually bathe prior to putting on make up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal not opaque
customer_reviews.text: I'm not satisfied with this color, the charcoal is metallic and I was hoping for something opaque and matte like the black. I have the black and I love it, but the charcoal seems to need several layers for me to not be transparent and then its heavy on the metallic which I don't like. I will be returning. I've had a lot for success in terms of color with NYX retractable eye liner "grey", its just doesn't last all day like these. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: just right and clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eye liner. It's not so waterproof that I need to use makeup removed. It comes off easily with lotion which I'm glad about; I don't want something that's difficult to remove. It didn't smudge and is perfect for cat eye makeup brushes. I checked the ingredients for this eyeliner on Environmental Working Group's website and the ingredients are a 2 so they're clean. The eyeliner sets in after about two minutes and doesn't smudge afterwards. Don't really know how water proof it is but doesn't come off during a workout. It's easy to apply and the brush that comes with it is good.
customer_reviews.author: AVz

customer_reviews.title: so happy to have found these again
customer_reviews.text: I used this eyeline for years and loved it's staying power. I ran out of it and never thought to look for it on here. I was looking at Maybelline's NY Tattoo and lol and behold there was my favorite eyeliner. Like so many others, my brush was bent as well. I do artwork so I'm going to see if any of my brushes will work with this but I think they may be too soft to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hirschman

customer_reviews.title: EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS!
customer_reviews.text: EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS! I really do not like having to constantly check to see if my eyeliner has smudged, ended up above my eyelid, or has in anyway changed from when it was applied. I've had my liner tattooed on, but had issues and it has since faded to almost nothing. I don't like reapplying it every day. That's just me. I just got this, but I'm already thrilled with how it's working. Staying on as promised! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a brown eyeliner for a less harsh look and this is great. I'm not used to gel liners and I can't make a wing with this myself but I don't usually wing my eyeliner anyway. It takes a bit more effort to get off than my liquid eyeliner but that's probably also a sign that it's long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Shauntey Kalweit

customer_reviews.title: I like the brush and the consistency of the gel
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I want an eyeliner that will not smudge. I don't wear a lot of make-up. In fact, I have to seek the youtube channels of girls 20 years younger than me to figure out how to put stuff on my face. I don't have a complete mono-lid or whatever, but I have yet to find a non-liquid eyeliner that doesn't smudge. I wanted something easier to use than a liquid one and longer lasting. I like the brush and the consistency of the gel, but it still it still kind of smudged for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and stays on for hours!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is AWESOME and its very easy to apply. It stays on for several hours, but if you live in a humid area in might smudge a bit, so make sure to keep that in mind. I've owned a department store cosmetic version of this and can honestly say they are very similar in terms of quality, this one may even be easier to apply. Otherwise, this is a great product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mehr

customer_reviews.title: Great product , genious angled brush handle
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is so easy to apply and stands up to all day and night wear. I use it only on top lid above false eyelashes. The bent brush handle makes the application a no brainer. it was easy before but even better now. I use a liquid eyeliner on the bottom only out of habit but I think this gel and brush would work too. Always close the little gel jar as soon as your done to prevent drying and clean off the brush on a paper towel to prevent it becoming stiff. This eyeliner will last a long time if treated right.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBralicky

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I have oily mature eye lids. So, I struggle with any eye make up. I’ve tried other water proof high end eyeliners without success. I gave up on attempting to wear liquid eyeliner. The reviews on this eye liner convinced me to give this a try, and I’m glad I did. This liquid eye liner has been a savior. Don’t underestimate drugstore products.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia N. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for expensive eyeliner sets!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is much easier to put on than others I have tried, and stays all during the day and into the evening on the upper lid (the lower area needed a bit of refreshing for dinner ) The brush is the same as similar brushes sold for lots of money, and the only inexpensive brush/eyeliner duo I have been able to find. I am a blond, and do not like black eye makeup. This I ordered in brown/black and it is perfect! It works without the harshness of black.
customer_reviews.author: ncgal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m now obsessed with this eyeliner. Great pigment. Dark. And I love the angled tool it comes with, (not supposed to be angled, mine arrived bent lol still works) but it makes for very easy application and shaping Wasted so many years fighting with liquid liner felt tip pens ...
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part of this product is the price. The longevity, smudge proof and water proof is questionable. I apply it on my lower eyelid and in half an hour already it has disappeared or smeared on to the edges of my eyes. I’ve yet to find a product that will not disappear.
customer_reviews.author: krlcrdv

customer_reviews.title: Best gel eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this eyeliner for years and it’s always been my go-to. I’ve tried using other gel pot eyeliners from high end to other drug store brands and this is always the one I go back to. It’s easy to use, stays on all day long, doesn’t smudge and the pot never dries out.
customer_reviews.author: Shay B

customer_reviews.title: No raccoon eyes for me anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm one of those people who looks like a raccoon every time I wear eyeliner. So, based on reviews here, I decided to give this a try. I can say it does a really good job not smearing down my eyes but by the end of the day, even this starts to smudge a little. I also am not too good with the brush technique and find it difficult to apply. With that said though, it is a solidly good product and does what it says it will - stay on your eyes - and is a great price. So, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C3inNJ

customer_reviews.title: Basic eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: It is a very basic eyeliner. Easy to apply. OK for every day wearing. However, I do not recommend if you’re going for a night on the town. It starts to smudge after a couple of hours. When I went to a sad movie and started crying it was not water resistant at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: A cat-eye essential! This stuff goes on smooth, has great color payoff, and makes perfect wings! There was a bit of a learning curve when I first started using it because the brush is angled (it used to be straight) but no biggie! I always go over my eyeliner with black eyeshadow so it isn't sticky and won't smudge. This stuff is solid!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, easy on the eyelids and creamy :D
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used pencil and liquid liners but I wanted to move on and try pot liners. I only wanted to experiment and not splurge on a higher end product so I took a chance and purchased this drugstore product. Turns out that I really like this eyeliner! The product feels nice and creamy when you take it from the pot to load up with a brush. Applying it is super easy since it glides on the lids (and i used an angled brush separate from the one included). I was able to create a clean, dark wing — which lasted up to 9 hrs with only my inner corner smudging. for the cost this liner is super worth!! :^)
customer_reviews.author: Julie N.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color for pale girls
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the charcoal because I'm super pale and wanted to avoid the overdone raccoon look. I'm too old for that! Anyway, this stuff is really easy to apply and honestly does last all day. Because of my overall coloring, it gives the illusion of black liner, but not as harsh, if that makes sense. It's a bit darker than I envisioned, but really it's gorgeous. I find the brush supplied is fine because I was not looking for a super fine line application anyway. I like a little smudgier, and this brush makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M. Christian

customer_reviews.title: as the one given doesn't make a good line. Also
customer_reviews.text: You will need to buy another brush, as the one given doesn't make a good line. Also, once you do get the makeup on correctly, it is incredibly difficult to remove, even with makeup remover! I found myself scrubbing y eyelids to get it off, unlike the usual brands I use. I like the color when it's on, but wow is it difficult to remove! I'll be saving this for special events where I need my makeup to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice waterproof eyeliner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good eyeliner, it's very smooth and its waterproof witch I didn't realized when I purchased it Lol anyways it's really good and I LOVE the small brush that comes with it it's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the pigmentation of this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pigmentation of this product. The brush that comes with it is nice but I would recommend using a different one, especially if you are trying to do a sharp wing. Great formula though! The only thing I would recommend or keep in mind is that it does transfer a bit. I have hooded eyes so if I make my liner too thick, it will leave a light mark on my eye where my eyes are hooded. That's why I try not to make it too thick. This isn't much of a problem for me though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye liner. It does not smudge even after hours of application. Looks beautiful and stays in shape. Lot of my friends asked what liner am I using and ordered for themselves. It is dark and highlights eye. Will stay smudge free throughout day even without touch up. Best for long office hours. I use contact lens and even with lens it does not irritate my eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Nopes for future .
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gel eyeliner I ever bought , I simply bought it bc of good reviews mentioned previously . For sure I am neutral about this , it's not so good or bad . On the positive side I like the size & container of the product plus it does not wear out for at least 4 hours . On not so positive side , I was expecting kind of ultra black colour but I think it's not so black on applying it turns into kind of subtle Gray black & the brush provided with product is not so useful . I don't think I am gonna buy it in future .
customer_reviews.author: Gunjan

customer_reviews.title: My #1 always!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this liner for years. It's the best, in my opinion, and one of the easiest to apply as well as very affordable. I did NOT buy it for its waterproof quality and like most other liners, will smudge if rubbed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Brode

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER been able to out on eye liner. I always used black eyeshadow because it's easier to control. This is so easy and creamy it comes in nice for someone like me who's nervous about it. It has time before it dries if you screw up so you aren't stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: TanoMonster

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner!!! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I used to ALWAYS use liquid eyeliner pens and I was worried about trying this because it always ends up all over my eyelids!!! (I like to line my upper lids with a cat eye)... but WOW this works GREAT! I mean YES I DO put on some eyelid primer which I think helps make it not smear off! I can't believe this stuff stays on all day!!!! So happy! I bought a different brush to go with it ( and that brush works PERFECTLY for applying this!! I am so happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja-Mary B

customer_reviews.title: easy application
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gel eyeliner. its not messy and pretty much stays on the eyelid without melting away in hotter temperatures. it does smear easy and is not a permanent or water proof item. if you must wear face moisturizer or eye cream the oil may make it easy to come off. this is a dark dramatic black color. the consistancy make it easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I have black hair and use the charcoal color for my eyebrows, it works great and doesn't look too harsh. Totally recommend, it is very easy to use and it goes where you place it and doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on too thick
customer_reviews.text: Goes on too thick & is unnatural looking. The description does say "drama," so I cannot fault it if that is what you want. Is not good for daytime wear. Powder works better for me. I would have given it only one star for the way it looks, but I gave two stars, because it is long lasting, does stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie's mom

customer_reviews.title: ESTATIC FIRST TIME USER!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I am 53 years old and have never tried liquid or gel eyeliner but here I am! Liquid was just too difficult. This Maybelline Gel Eyeliner is absolutely amazing! I found it so easy to put on and it did not easily smudge once I let it set. Love it! I'll be using it from now on...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used in the state they send it in!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this in a store before and love it. The brush was bent on the first order, got a replacement and the brush was bent also. The make-up cannot be applied, the way the brush is bent. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Napper

customer_reviews.title: Ooo LaLa Lovely Maybelline!
customer_reviews.text: Use this product everyday. It lasts relatively long and gives just the right effect of a liner. This product is easy to apply. The colour is perfect when you want the liner effect but don't want it harsh as in black, but softer. This product comes in wonderful colours which I use @ different times of the year. Like sapphire, navy blue, eggplant and charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: JeMicheSunshine

customer_reviews.title: No Returns!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this item a few times. This last time, my application stick was slightly bent. I contacted the company and apparently they don’t do returns! I was disappointed with that. I did try to straighten the stick and it’s done ok when applying. It does tend to dry out towards the end, when close to finishing. I haven’t tried to moisture it.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Probably the easiest eyeliner to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Put it on in the morning, stays on all day! I pat a little powder after using it to seal it in place. You can then apply again to get a sharper look. The brush is worth the price of admission!
customer_reviews.author: Liz D.

customer_reviews.title: The absolute very best eye liner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite eye liner ever. It comes with an exact painting brush and is a creamy and smooth consistently packaged in a nice round gllass jar. I have tried so many kinds from liquid to pencil styles. This is the best. It is smudge prof, the very blackest black and it actually stays on for hours and hours looking perfect. I almost want to stock up on it just in case it somehow gets discontinued. You just never know how fickle the public can be. One minute liking one trend to another.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylula blue

customer_reviews.title: First Gel Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience using a gel eyeliner with the use of a brush, and I have to say I really like this so much better than using a pencil! This is great for beginners like me, but I know that other experienced users have always liked this product. This eyeliner lasts all day too! I love the dark pigment and the ease of creating a line with the included brush. A lot easier than it may seem! :) I would definitely recommend this eyeliner to anyone who wants to give brush eyeliner a try! It won't break your bank and you may like it even more than a pencil!
customer_reviews.author: mrs. e

customer_reviews.title: Great Value With Quality
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this eyeliner, forget any liquid eye liners out there, this one glides smoothly, and do not worry if you messed up, you can easily re-correct, unlike the other liquid ones yo have to start from zero. Stays for a long time and it is water/smudge proof. Even beginners will find this easy to use and apply to their eyes, Recommended to anyone who wants long-lasting, easy apply/remove eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: meerdeer

customer_reviews.title: Wings for dummies
customer_reviews.text: The brush its self is worth the cost. Very good, easy to use. If you are looking to be able to do a wing this is what you need. Other products on eyes: Superhero by It Jaclyn hill palette NYX white eyeliner
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have it in several colors... Easy to use, goes on smoothly and stays on till you take ithe off. Plus comes with a quality brush, which is half the battle
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Schumacher-cox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a preview before but this product was exactly what I had been looking for. The liquid eyeliners that I have used in the past do not last very long and the effect is too extreme for my taste. This product is a softer look. I use it at the bottom of my eye along the lashes. I have another product I use on my upper lid that works well for that and was not working for the bottom of my eye. In addition, the price was so reasonable. A definite five star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner! It glides on really smooth and super ...
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner! It glides on really smooth and super easy to apply and get nice shape... wish I had tried this kind of eyeliner sooner. No more having to deal with constant dull pencils and sharpening! The brush applicator is perfect and the gel applies as pretty intense hard lines but I find it very easy to get nice soft smooth lines which I prefer... usually just run over the edge with another brush, usually with some pigmented black eyeshadow and it will soften it perfectly and help set it... or even just going over it gently with my finger will work. Considering how long this little jar will last (way longer than pencils), it's a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Cair Paravel

customer_reviews.title: ... heard many artists say they think this is as great as MAC's blacktrack
customer_reviews.text: I have heard many artists say they think this is as great as MAC's blacktrack. I would strongly disagree and here's why: Maybelline's is thicker and is more difficult to apply because of that. MAC's is more smooth and fluid when applying. Maybelline's is not as rich in color, almost has a dry appearance, whereas MAC's is black as it gets and stays that way all day! By the end of the night Maybelline's smudges. MAC's is difficult to remove but worth it for longevity and it's amazing ability to stay put. This is a good middle of the road liner.
customer_reviews.author: JA&KA

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL EYELINER
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite eyeliner. I have very oily skin and pencils melt/smear off within a few hours. Liquid liner lasts a little longer on me, but still looks bad at the end of the day. Plus with liquid liner I always had a shaky line and had to use q-tips to smooth it out. Not so with this gel liner, which offers more control. THIS STUFF STAYS ON LIKE A CHARM. I have no idea what I did all the years before I found this. Easy-as-pie wingtips with the little brush, too. If I had to pick one makeup product to use the rest of my life it would be this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Better than liquid liners
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I’ve purchased in like 8 years. It works great. I prefer to use my own brush to make a thinner line. It doesn’t smudge on the eye. It dries pretty quickly. And you can do several coats to make it super super black
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Product is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to apply. I expected it to be a rich chestnut brown to match my eyes but it's more sable brown. chestnut brown is so hard to find anyway. The product packaging was battered and open, though the jar was fresh and contents unused.
customer_reviews.author: Chaika

customer_reviews.title: Forgiving eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is more forgiving than the regular eyeliner. But, if you have it on all day, it smears down onto the bottom eye lid which I don't line. So, I need to wash it off and fix the top line if I am going out that night.
customer_reviews.author: amazon client

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner I have found!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye liner I have found. Goes on smooth and lasts pretty well. One of my eyes waters more than the other so that eye sometimes does lose the eye liner after all day.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Rose

customer_reviews.title: New fave eyeliner (previous liquid liner user)
customer_reviews.text: Cons: let's face it, the brush is terribly thick. I've managed to flatten it to make sharp lines but, yikes. Product itself freaking love! LIQUID LINER WHO?!? This is Def not smudge proof, but it IS water resistant. Super smooth application, no cracking EVER, a ton of product for the price( compared to stick liners or liquid), it goes where you put it, none of that still being wet and messy business. I love it. I hope they make this forever.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd attempt in seeking a smooth eye liner.. and this product EXCEEDED my expectations!! I just turned 54 and I have decent mature skin and this glides on my eyelids so smoothly and effortless.. this is my favorite makeup product thus far!! 😁👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: C. Navarrete LMT

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gel eye liner compared to top brands from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gel eye liner compared to top brands from Sephora. I only have to buy this every 8-12 months, lasts me forever. I replace the eyeliner brush every couple of months with a $1 ELF one, but I make sure to clean off the eyeliner after each use to keep it clean and prevent the brush from getting clumpy or from doing that weird curling thing; helps to keep the edge sharp/straight for easy application.
customer_reviews.author: KassandraM

customer_reviews.title: Very dry, hard to apply bc of that...
customer_reviews.text: This formula for me was super dry almost like clay. I had a very hard time applying I switched over to another brand that comes with drops that you can hydrate the line with to make it more lubricated and that works much better....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: The only and the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner that stays dark 24/7! Just like the old liquid. Over the years I’ve tried every brand. If you want that long lasting dark line this is it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirasheba

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth unlike any other eyeliner I've used it doesnt get stuck to my eyelashes when putting on! And gives a perfect look. Will be buying more. Only thing I'd change is the size it's really small but if only using on eyes then it will go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Not so good, doesn't stay long
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner doesn't stay long. I have tried other brand before which was good. Wanted to try something different but this didnt work well on me.
customer_reviews.author: Preeti

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Got this one since I've heard alot of people raving about it. It does the job, and the best part is, its smudge proof and can be easily removed if required.
customer_reviews.author: shakyas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the felt tip pens without success. My go to is an eyeliner gel pencil. Tried this after reading the reviews. Wow! Really surprised and pleased with the quality. Long lasting, doesn't smudge, easy to apply and should last a long time! Great price. Do yourself a favor and try it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jaylynn

customer_reviews.title: The Best Eyeliner Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It is a professional grade product, much like I have had used on my eyes when I used a make-up artist. It's also half the price I have paid for this style of eyeliner even in discount stores. Like that famous pink tube of mascara by Maybelline, this company knows how to make your eyes look gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Freeny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything everyone has write about it. Rich color, stays on and applies sooooo well and I'm a first time user. I find it easier to use than a pencil liner. You get more of an even line. I also use MAC's liquid liner and have to say there is no difference in quality or stay on power. Both are equal except for MAC is a bit more pricey. I plan to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used liquid eyeliner to get as close as possible to my lash line. Glad I crawled out from living under my rock and try this gel eyeliner!!! It was smooth, easy, and super close to my lash line with having to go over my line 3 more times causing me to end up with the thickest eyeliner!! MY NEW FAVORITE EYELINER!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eye liner for about ... 7 or so years maybe. The formula is still the same, this will always be my favorite. The charcoal color is nice and still very bold but not as in your face as the black is. There is a slight shimmer in it. It does come with the brush so you don't need anything else to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMeBaby1MoreTime

customer_reviews.title: This is a great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an easy gel eyeliner, this is your product. It goes on smooth, lasts all day and maintains its color. You can use a light layer during the day and easily add to it for an evening look.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Dried and has no pigment
customer_reviews.text: Its hard and hardly has any pigment. And carefully read its non-returnable
customer_reviews.author: VHHM

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled at the quality of this eyeliner. No more smudging ,smearing, flaking in eyes . I can leave on all day and not see raccoon eyes !
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Clinton

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I've ever used. Every single one I've had smudges and I have to clean it from under my eyes several times a day. This one I don't have to worry about. The pictures show before, when I apply it at 7 am and after, around 7 pm, after GOING TO THE GYM! It did come off a bit, but there is no smudge. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Geisa B. Thielen

customer_reviews.title: Not kidding - stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: Never will I go back to pencil eye liners. With the right angled brush from MAC and this gel it's long lasting eye makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Shama’

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner I've used in my life. It is sweatproof, smudge proof, and it's perfect for my oily eyelids. I did not use the brush that came with it because I read the reviews before purchasing and bought a separate brush. I will definitely be buying this eyeliner in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tashauna Moton

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different brands of more expensive eye liner before trying this product. (Obviously, I was unhappy with the other ones if I was still looking around.) The Lasting Drama Gel in charcoal is awesome. Still looks great by the end of the day. Also does not look as harsh as liquid eyeliners. The brush is really good. It's possible to control the width of the line from really narrow to rather wide, and do so quite easily. Also, a little goes a long way, and it's easy to see how much is left in the container. I am really happy I tried this product - recommended without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: SheSellsSeashells

customer_reviews.title: Easier to work with than expected
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to makeup I’m a complete noob but I’ve found it very easy to work with the formula. It’s smooth and doesn’t get clumpy. One of my eyes is ever so slightly bigger so have to apply a thinner line and the brush that comes with the gel liner has no problem doing just that. A+ product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product! It’s a gel so it goes on a lot easier than a crayon or liquid. You really don’t need much. I put it on when it arrived and I ended up crying over something and it was surprisingly still perfect. You definitely need makeup wipes to take it off! 10/10 recommended
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Love. I've tried a ton of different eyeliners over ...
customer_reviews.text: Love. I've tried a ton of different eyeliners over the years and have mostly stuck to tried and true pencils. I made the switch to this eyeliner after a friend suggested it and it's been great! Applies easily, dark color without trying, easy to do thin vs thick lines. The only downside is (like a pencil), it can smear *fairly* easily. Meaning if you wipe your eyes you'll come off with it on your hands... to be expected though unless you're using a liquid liner! Love it overall!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: My Favourite Eye Liner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Since first trying the Maybelline eye liner I haven't used any other brand. The applicator brush is the perfect size for applying the cream based liner easily and smoothly. The liner doesn't flake or crack after extended wear like liquid liners, and it doesn't drip, either. I've used the purple--plum? I forget the exact name of the colour--before, and loved that as well. This time I'm using the brown for a subtler look as I prepare for my wedding cosmetics, and I love it as much as I loved it the first time around. I highly recommend this liner.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Poppet

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon eyes no more!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this! I wear contacts and have watery eyes and this stayed on! Even with my false lashes and made my eyes pop. The brush also gave the perfect point. Stayed all night and even with sweat and watery eyes.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place all day!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this because I was sick of my eyeliner smearing up my eyelid throughout the day. I was worried because I've never used this type of eyeliner and thought it would be hard to apply however I was pleasantly surprised. The brush it comes with is stiff which makes it easy to get a nice straight line. Best of all, this stays in place all day!
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: makes a great line and wing!
customer_reviews.text: my go to liner for a flawless wing! gets a bit dried out if you take too long to use it all, but a little water on your brush works or i just buy a new one because the price is so great!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia C.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but way better than most!
customer_reviews.text: PROs It's fairly easy to apply using an eye liner brush I have the black and like the color - it's not too much and not too little It does seem to lighten during the day but not enough I've ever reapplied CONs the brush that comes with is OK but not the best especially if you like to do tails Dries out in the jar faster than I have ever been able to get to the bottom All in all this is not a bad purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: JPlattinum

customer_reviews.title: I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: My eyelids (just one actually-weird) are oily and it never failed, anytime I used a typical pencil eyeliner, on the one oily eyelid, the liner would end up in the crease on my eye and disappear from the lid making me reapply it several times a day. I've tried liquid eye liners but could not get the application down.. and then I tried this gel eyeliner and I will NEVER use anything else! It stays all day and after a few applications, I feel like a pro when I put it on in the morning now. Definitely a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: JRKnick

customer_reviews.title: Really accents blue eyes; it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a spaZz with make up. I actually feared buying this. But my pencils all smudged and I looked stupid and messy, so I gave it a shot. Once I got up the nerve, steadied my wrist on my cheek, and applied this, it lasted all day. It was too thick so I used a Qtip to take off a bit. Colleagues commented that my eyes "popped" and at day's end, it was still on. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Makeup Eyestudio Lasting Drama Gel Eye Liner, Blackest Black, Waterproof, 0.106 Ounce,Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Color:950 BLACKEST BLACKAchieve winged drama with Maybelline New York’s Eyestudio Lasting Drama Waterproof Gel Pencil Eyeliner for a lasting impression with intense color. The waterproof gel eyeliner sets instantly and glides on easily to deliver intense color that lasts up to 24 hours. Intensify your eye makeup and get bold liner looks with the highly concentrated pigments found in the gel eyeliner. The oil-free and smudge-proof formula is ophthalmologist, dermatologist and allergy tested. The eyeliner is safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. Available in 10 highly pigmented colors ranging from the classic black eyeliner such as Sleek Onyx to another classic the blue eyeliner like Lustrous Sapphire and Polished Amethyst.
feature_bullets: Ophtalmologist, dermatologist and allergy tested creamy gel formula was specially designed to last up to 24 hours
Highly concentrated pigments of the gel eyeliner intensifies your eye makeup for a lasting impression
Eyestudio Lasting Drama Waterproof Gel Pencil Eyeliner delivers intense color that lasts all day for natural or dramatic eye makeup looks
Gel pencil eyeliner available in 10 super-saturated shades ranging from Smooth Charcoal to Lustrous Saphire
Eyestudio Lasting Drama Waterproof Gel Pencil Eyeliner is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
